    • Method Detail

      • translate

        SQLQuery translate(ConjunctiveQuery query)
            throws AtomSetException
        Translates a ConjunctiveQuery into an SQL query
        Parameters:
        query -
        Returns:
        the String representation of an SQL query which is equivalent to the specified ConjunctiveQuery.
        Throws:
        AtomSetException

      • translate

        Iterator<SQLQuery> translate(Rule rangeRestrictedRule)
                      throws AtomSetException
        Translates a rule into an "INSERT ... SELECT ..." SQL statement.
        Parameters:
        rangeRestrictedRule - a range restricted rule (i.e. all variables that appear in the head also occur in the body).
        Returns:
        a string representing the generated SQL statement. If the rule does not fulfill the range restricted condition the behavior is undefined.
        Throws:
        AtomSetException

      • translateContainsQuery

        SQLQuery translateContainsQuery(Atom atom)
                         throws AtomSetException
        Produces a SQL contains Query. The produced query should return one tuple if the specified atom is present, no tuple otherwise.
        Parameters:
        atom -
        Returns:
        a SQLQuery encapsuling the SQL string which represents the contains query.
        Throws:
        AtomSetException

        Returns:
